Innumerable lands equal to the number of sentient beings, filled with wondrous jeweled canopies,
All used to make offerings to a single Tathagata, offering to all Buddhas in the same way.
Anointing incense is incomparable, most excellent, never before seen in the world,
Using this to make offerings to the Teacher of Gods and Humans, exhausting eons equal to the number of sentient beings.
Incense powders, burning incense, the finest flowers, various jeweled garments, and adornments,
Making offerings in this way to the most excellent ones, joyfully serving without weariness.
Equal to the number of sentient beings, lamps illuminating the world, moment by moment accomplishing great enlightenment,
Also using boundless verses to praise and make offerings to the Tamer of Humans.
As numerous as all sentient beings, I make offerings to the World-Honored Buddhas with the most sublime offerings,
For as many eons as there are sentient beings, I praise them in this way without end.
When making offerings to the Buddhas in this way, by the Buddhas' spiritual power, they pervade everywhere,
I see all the immeasurable Buddhas in the ten directions, abiding in the practices of Samantabhadra Bodhisattva.
All the wholesome roots in the past, future, and present,
Cause me to always cultivate the practices of Samantabhadra and quickly attain abiding in the stage of Samantabhadra.
All the Buddhas' knowledge and vision of the immeasurable sentient beings in the world,
May they all be replete like Samantabhadra and be praised by the wise.
This is the practice of dedication cultivated by the great beings in the ten directions,
The Buddhas and Tathagatas speak for me, this practice of dedication is supreme.
In the worlds of the ten directions, without exception, all the sentient beings therein,
Must all be caused to attain enlightenment, and always be like Samantabhadra's practice.
